acids. Monounsaturated fatsolive, peanut, and canola oilsare healthy alternatives to animal fats. The table below shows the sources of fats, broken down into three types of fats that should be eaten less often and good fats that can be eaten more often.
                
Sources of Fats
                
Eat Less Often    Eat More Often        Saturated fats          - red meat      - poultry      - whole milk      - butter      - lard        Monounsaturated fats          - corn oil      - safflow
